title: Epic Mountain Vista
description: A breathtaking panoramic view of snow-capped mountain peaks bathed in golden morning light, with dramatic clouds rolling through the valleys below.
camera: Wide establishing shot, slowly pushing forward
lighting: Golden hour, warm sunlight filtering through clouds
environment: High altitude mountain peak at sunrise
motion: Slow forward push, slight tilt up to reveal scale
ending: Hold on the vast mountain range

title: Urban Night Chase
description: High-energy chase sequence through neon-lit city streets with dynamic camera movement and dramatic lighting contrasts.
motion: Fast tracking shot, weaving through obstacles

title: Intimate Coffee Shop Moment
description: A quiet, contemplative scene in a cozy coffee shop with warm, natural lighting and shallow depth of field.
camera: Medium close-up, shallow depth of field
lighting: Soft window light, warm interior ambiance
motion: Subtle focus pull from background to foreground
